module.name: pss_pdfinvoiceplus
module.description: <style type="text/css">a.descriptionLink {color:blue;text-decoration:underline;} a.descriptionLink:hover{color:red;text-decoration:none;}div.pssDescriptionDiv {background:#6a6a6a; color:white; padding:3px; margin-top:2px;}</style><div class="pssDescriptionDiv">Add some custom multi-lingual text / html to the PDF invoice (after the order details)</div>
module.author: PrestaScope
